languages.text: "Я..." {n}Девушка поджимает губы и отводит взгляд.{/n} "...все еще помню нашу первую встречу, Домин. Словно она была вчера. Каждый день, проведенный в храме Неумирающего. Каждое напутствие Висиря. Каждую душу, сопровожденную по другую сторону. Каждую... смерть тела и каждое воскрешение".

"I..." {n}She winces and looks away.{/n} "I still remember our first meeting, Domin. Like it was yesterday. Every day I spent at the temple of the Undying One. Every one of the Vizsier's lessons. Every soul I've ever ushered to the other side. Every... death of my body, and every revival."
languages.original_text: "Я..." {n}Девушка поджимает губы и отводит взгляд.{/n} "...все еще помню нашу первую встречу, Домин. Словно она была вчера. Каждый день, проведенный в храме Неумирающего. Каждое напутствие Висиря. Каждую душу, сопровожденную по другую сторону. Каждую... смерть тела и каждое воскрешение".

Every one of the Vizsier's lessons. Every soul I've ever ushered to the other side. Every... death of my body, and every revival."

"I..." {n}She winces and looks away.{/n} "I still remember our first meeting, Domin. Like it was yesterday. Every day I spent at the temple of the Undying One. Every one of the Vizsier's lessons. Every soul I've ever ushered to the other side. Every... death of my body, and every revival."

languages.text: «Yo...». {n}Hace una mueca y desvía la mirada.{/n} «Aún recuerdo la primera vez que nos vimos, Domin. Como si fuese ayer. Cada día que pasé en el templo del Inmortal. Cada lección del Visir. Cada alma que he enviado al otro lado. Cada... muerte de mi cuerpo, y cada resurrección».
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}She winces and looks away.{/n} "I still remember our first meeting, Domin. Like it was yesterday. Every day I spent at the temple of the Undying One. Every one of the Vizsier's lessons. Every soul I've ever ushered to the other side. Every... death of my body, and every revival."

traits.locale_text: «Yo...». {n}Hace una mueca y desvía la mirada.{/n} «Aún recuerdo la primera vez que nos vimos, Domin. Como si fuese ayer. Cada día que pasé en el templo del Inmortal. Cada lección del Visir. Cada alma que he enviado al otro lado. Cada... muerte de mi cuerpo, y cada resurrección».

languages.text: 「私は…」{n}彼女は身じろぎして、視線を逸らす。{/n}「初めて出会った時のことを覚えているよ、ドミン。まるで昨日のことのように。毎日、不死の者の神殿で過ごしていた。ヴィジールの教えをひとつ残らず。あちら側へと送り出したすべての魂。私の体のすべての…死を、そしてすべての蘇生を」
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}She winces and looks away.{/n} "I still remember our first meeting, Domin. Like it was yesterday. Every day I spent at the temple of the Undying One. Every one of the Vizsier's lessons. Every soul I've ever ushered to the other side. Every... death of my body, and every revival."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…」{n}彼女は身じろぎして、視線を逸らす。{/n}「初めて出会った時のことを覚えているよ、ドミン。まるで昨日のことのように。毎日、不死の者の神殿で過ごしていた。ヴィジールの教えをひとつ残らず。あちら側へと送り出したすべての魂。私の体のすべての…死を、そしてすべての蘇生を」

languages.text: “我……”{n}她畏缩着，移开了视线。{/n}“我还记得我们第一次见面的情形，秘者，就像昨天一样。我记得在不死之神的圣殿里度过的每一天，宿老传授的每一节课，每个被我带往彼岸的灵魂，还有……我的肉体的每次死亡，以及接下来的每次苏醒。”
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}She winces and looks away.{/n} "I still remember our first meeting, Domin. Like it was yesterday. Every day I spent at the temple of the Undying One. Every one of the Vizsier's lessons. Every soul I've ever ushered to the other side. Every... death of my body, and every revival."

traits.locale_text: “我……”{n}她畏缩着，移开了视线。{/n}“我还记得我们第一次见面的情形，秘者，就像昨天一样。我记得在不死之神的圣殿里度过的每一天，宿老传授的每一节课，每个被我带往彼岸的灵魂，还有……我的肉体的每次死亡，以及接下来的每次苏醒。”

languages.text: "Ich ..." {n}Sie verzieht das Gesicht und wendet den Blick ab.{/n} "Ich erinnere mich noch an unser erstes Zusammentreffen, Domin. Als wäre es gestern gewesen. An jeden Tag im Tempel des Todlosen. An jede Lektion des Wesirs. An jede Seele, die ich jemals auf die andere Seite gebracht habe. An jeden ... Tod meines Körpers und jede Wiederbelebung."
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}She winces and looks away.{/n} "I still remember our first meeting, Domin. Like it was yesterday. Every day I spent at the temple of the Undying One. Every one of the Vizsier's lessons. Every soul I've ever ushered to the other side. Every... death of my body, and every revival."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ..." {n}Sie verzieht das Gesicht und wendet den Blick ab.{/n} "Ich erinnere mich noch an unser erstes Zusammentreffen, Domin. Als wäre es gestern gewesen. An jeden Tag im Tempel des Todlosen. An jede Lektion des Wesirs. An jede Seele, die ich jemals auf die andere Seite gebracht habe. An jeden ... Tod meines Körpers und jede Wiederbelebung."

languages.text: « Je... {n}commence-t-elle avant de détourner le regard en grimaçant.{/n} Je me souviens encore de notre première rencontre, Domin. Comme si c'était hier. Chaque jour passé au temple de l'Immortel. Chacune des leçons du vizir. Chaque âme que j'ai envoyée de l'autre côté. Chaque fois que mon corps... est mort pour mieux ressusciter. »
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}She winces and looks away.{/n} "I still remember our first meeting, Domin. Like it was yesterday. Every day I spent at the temple of the Undying One. Every one of the Vizsier's lessons. Every soul I've ever ushered to the other side. Every... death of my body, and every revival."

Chaque jour passé au temple de l'Immortel. Chacune des leçons du vizir. Chaque âme que j'ai envoyée de l'autre côté. Chaque fois que mon corps... est mort pour mieux ressusciter. »

Every one of the Vizsier's lessons. Every soul I've ever ushered to the other side. Every... death of my body, and every revival."

languages.text: "Ben..." {n}Kibellah, irkilerek gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n} "Tanıştığımız günü hâlâ hatırlıyorum Domin. Sanki dün gibi. Ölmeyen'in tapınağında geçirdiğim her günü. Vezir'in derslerinin her birini. Öteki tarafa taşıdığım her bir ruhu. Kendi... Bedenimin her bir ölümünü ve her bir dirilişini."
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}She winces and looks away.{/n} "I still remember our first meeting, Domin. Like it was yesterday. Every day I spent at the temple of the Undying One. Every one of the Vizsier's lessons. Every soul I've ever ushered to the other side. Every... death of my body, and every revival."
